entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:25 p.m. MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or a few flurries changing to a few flurries after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 2:15 PM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:15 PM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 2:15 PM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
